Instruction: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Prepare a 9x13-inch baking dish by greasing and flouring it.

Mix eggs, oil, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a bowl until smooth. Add pecans, flour, and vanilla, and stir until well combined. Pour the batter into the greased and floured 9x13-inch baking dish.
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing and transferring to a wire rack to finish cooling.
Allow the cake to cool on a platter completely.
